modName: Ace Quan Chi playable demon race mod
summary: This mod allows you to play as Quan Chi from Mortal Kombat. It is based on the MK9 game, including the spells such as trance, skull attack and rune trap. I made this upon request on an unfinished follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][img]http://press-start.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/quan-chi.jpg[/img]
Personal/Unrelated:[/b][/size]

A year and a half ago I set out to make a custom follower mod, fully voiced, spells, amour,weapons with short quests and some quest/location awareness all based around Quan Chi. I did most of the work but I couldn't find a reliable voice actor to help out. I left that project to die until someone, some how found my hidden video on Youtube that was meant for voice actors. He requested that I release the resources so he could find someone to make a race mod out of it or he would compensate me for my work. Long story short, I just offered to make it for him free of charge. I didn't want ALL my work to go to waste so I didn't see why I couldn't make this for him and share it on Nexus.
[color=#00ff00][u][b][size=6]
Short Description:[/size][/b][/u][/color]

Play as Quan Chi from the Mortal Kombat games by Netherrealm Studios.


[color=#ff00ff][u][b][size=6]Description/Info:[/size][/b][/u][/color]

Read about Quan Chi here:
http://mortalkombat.wikia.com/wiki/Quan_Chi

Race description:

The Oni are a vicious race of demonic beings that inhabit the Netherrealm. An Oni can transcend into a Demon with their mastery over sorcery.
Demons are great spellswords, they favour illusion but excel in most spell schools as well as one handed weapons.

Starting Spells: I tried to replicate most of the spells from Mortal Kombat 9.

Trance: Put the enemy into a trance. The target will walk towards the area of the caster when cast completely unaware of the battle at hand.
Skull Attack: Shoot a glowing green skull at the target to take X damage.
Rune Trap: Cast a rune that will heavily stagger the target.
Quick Health: Recharge your health for a short period.
Boost One Handed: Boost your one handed skill for a short period.

Starting Stats:

Conjuration:5
Illusion:10
Destruction:5
One Handed:5
Light Armour:5
Restoration:5

Misc:
18 unarmed damage
Heath regen: 1
Magicka regen: 4
Stamina regen: 4


[b]Other/bugs/help:[/b]

For some reason rings and amulets don't show on the character(it could just be my game since I have 100+ mods).
The head markings shine/glare for some reason. In my old mod I figured out how to fix that problem but it's been a while and I can't figure it out.
As with most custom race mods, if you plan to use a transformation you'll most likely need a mod that will revert you properly.
If you're good with descriptions feel free to drop a comment.
I recommend using RaceMenu mod. If you manage to make Quan Chi look much closer than I did with the CK editor, send the preset to me and I'll update the mod and use your images. Credit where it's due, of course.

Version 1.0:
Released.



If you like class and build related mods, check my other mods out![size=1]
[/size]
author: Elias
